channel.title: Attacking in Non-Wild
channel.description:
Alright i want to know if anyone knows how to make it so a non-wild place is attackable for all levels and if u die u wont lose items. I have tried copying the fight pit codes and it dont work for some reason but i know its something simple so please feedback i need help.
I have
[ul][li]Coords[/li][/ul]
Thats about it but i need the main code and where to put it

item.title: Attacking in Non-Wild
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

All in client class.

[code] public boolean inFunPk() {
if (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) {
return true;

} else {
  return false;
}

}[/code]

Search for -

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel <

You should see this -

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame()){ sM("Your level difference is too great!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness.");

Change it to -

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame() && !inFunPk()){ sM("Your level difference is too great!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness.");

Then, search for -

if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel

You should see this -

if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < castOnPlayer.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame()){ sM("Your level difference is too great!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); toX = absX; toY = absY; break; }

Change it to this -

if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < castOnPlayer.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame() && !inFunPk()){ sM("Your level difference is too great!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); toX = absX; toY = absY; break; }

Then, search for -

if (deathStage == 1)

Scroll down a bit, and you should see this -

		if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {

Change it to this -

		if (!IsInFightCave() && !inFunPk() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {

Under that, add this -

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && inFunPk()) { toX = ####; toY = ####; AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; sM("Oh dear you have died!"); resetOtherAtk(); followID = 0; followID2 = 0; }

It should work now. All I’ve done is created an area which is named “inFunPk”, then excluded it from a few methods, and added a death stage. Good luck.

Read full topic
